text: 16.11 Development within these centres will need to demonstrate how it accords with policies and guidance within the hierarchy as appropriate. 16.12 The western part of the borough (as shown on Figures 6 and 18) lies within the CAZ. The CAZ is the geographical, economic, and administrative heart of London, one of the world’s most important financial and business centres, and contains the Metropolitan employment, leisure and retail designations within London. 16.13 All development proposals within this zone should refer to the relevant policies set out in the London Plan and the CAZ Supplementary Planning Guidance. TOWN CENTRES 16.14 Within the CAZ, three areas are designated as ‘CAZ Centres’.
